text: William Cobbett (9 March 1763â€“ 18 June 1835) was a journalist and Member of Parliament for England for the Radicals. He made many journeys around England. He wrote a book called Rural Rides about what he saw. ==References== Category:1763 births Category:1835 deaths Category:English essayists Category:English journalists Category:Members of the British House of Commons for English constituencies Category:Writers from Surrey
